snippet.title: M.O.O.D.S. Demo Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to the World of M.O.O.D.S.
Where Machines were abandoned by their human masters and now fight for the power of emotions!

Steam Demo: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1956770/MOODS/

We are proud to announce our participation in the Going Rogue Event on Steam with our latest Demo Version of M.O.O.D.S.! During the entire Event, you will be able to download and play our game for free.

There is a scrapload of content already available within the game: 
► Two different classes (you have to work a little to try the second one)
► Venture into Mitron's Kingdom and descend up to six floors deep 
► Face three different Mech Bosses in order to beat this demo
► Six different Weapons enable different ways of disassembling hostile Mechs
► Over a million Weapon modification combinations, we did the math

If you do decide to check out M.O.O.D.S., it would be very helpful if you take a minute to fill out our 
https://forms.gle/tJk57KNGVFZhu4Q68 and provide some feedback we can use to further improve the game, every opinion counts!

To keep up with the newest developments and future demos and releases, make sure to join our  Discord Server and Social Media Accounts!

You can find us here:
► Discord: https://discord.gg/dfYQp8AEtv
► Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1956770/MOODS/
► Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/stickystonestudio/
► Twitter: https://twitter.com/StoneSticky
► Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/stickystonestudio
► Linktree: https://linktr.ee/stickystonestudio
